participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and sociable, often shares her aspirations and feelings openly.
participant_1.background: A college student working at a bar to support her education while pursuing a nursing degree.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and pragmatic, balances professional and personal life with a focus on family.
participant_2.background: A nurse who also works as a real estate agent, managing responsibilities as a stay-at-home dad.

content.text: What is your favourite food?I hope it's not chicken.I don't like chicken.
I like going to the movies in general, but i am not really into movies.
I want to become a nurse.You ?
I am a nurse. I am a real estate agent.
I'm working at a bar at night so i can pay for my college.What do you do for college debts?
I am a student, i am a stay at home mom.
